title: Hawai'i Volcanoes National Park: Kahuku Forest Restoration Time Lapse
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Plants     Experimental Forest Restoration     Kahuku Forest Restoration Time Lapse                  Kahuku Forest Restoration Time Lapse                         Kahuku Exclosure 34 second slideshow  Duration:34 seconds           Â    This time lapse slideshow represents Kahuku exclosure area T2 that was treated with herbicide ( see http://www.nps.gov/havo/naturescience/experimental-exclosures.htm ). The slides are of the same spot from 2006 to 2011.
